ruling: - You cannot activate [[Strike Ninja]]'s effect during the Damage Step.

- [[Strike Ninja]]'s effect is a Quick Effect so you can chain it to another Spell Speed 1 or 2 effect and can activate it outside your Main Phases, even during your opponent's turn (but not during the Damage Step).
- You can only activate [[Strike Ninja]]'s effect when [[Strike Ninja]] is face-up on the field.
- Removing 2 DARK monsters for [[Strike Ninja]]'s effect is a cost.
